Measure.name: ExtendedWeightedClassComplexity
Measure.description: The Extended Weighted Class Complexity (EWCC)metric measures the complexity of code design and its maintainability. This metric is based on WCC and adds the cognitive complexity of the classes whose it derives, to compute the cognitive weight of a class. Then to compute the full code weight, EWCC adds the weight of each class if there are in the same level or multiply if there is derivation link.
